lead_paragraph: WELLNER--Charles. Beloved son of Isidor and Angele Wellner and treasured uncle of Emily Angele Russo passed away peacefully in his home on June 3 at the age of 91. Charles was forced to flee with his family from his home in Belgium in 1940 and then served in his adopted country's Armed Forces during World War II . He was a generous contributor to many Jewish charitable organizations and also was a major supporter of Technion University in Haifa, Israel. He was predeceased by his sister Georgette Wlodawer and his niece Danielle Blanche Sedlis. 1/3
